      • ShoppingBill

        public ShoppingBill(java.util.List<ShoppingOrder> shoppingOrderList)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor that accepts a pre-defined list of orders to include on this bill.
        Parameters:
        shoppingOrderList - The list of orders to include on this bill
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws if the order list is null or if the orders contain invalid items in them.

    • Method Detail

      • getShoppingOrders

        public java.util.List<ShoppingOrder> getShoppingOrders()
        Returns the shopping orders on this bill.
        Returns:

      • addShoppingOrder

        public void addShoppingOrder(ShoppingOrder shoppingOrder)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a shopping order to the bill.
        Parameters:
        shoppingOrder - The shopping order to add to the bill.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Throws if the shopping bill hasn't been properly initialized.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws if the shopping order that is passed, is null or invalid.

      • removeShoppingOrderIfExists

        public boolean removeShoppingOrderIfExists(ShoppingOrder orderToRemove)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Attempts to remove the given shopping order from the bill.
        Parameters:
        orderToRemove - The order to remove from the bill.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the item was removed, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Throws if the bill hasn't been properly initialized.

      • removeAllShoppingOrders

        public void removeAllShoppingOrders()
                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Removes all shopping orders from the bill.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Throws if bill has not been properly initialized.

      • isValidShoppingBill

        public boolean isValidShoppingBill()
        Verifies the bill has been properly initialized.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the shopping bill is valid, otherwise false.

      • calculateSumOfOrders

        public double calculateSumOfOrders()
        Calculates the sum of all order in the bill.
        Returns:
        Returns the sum of all orders in the bill, as a double.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the bill as a formatted string. 
         Example output:
 
 *******Order 1*******
 1 book: 13.74
 2 music players: 23.45
 Sales Tax: 2.33
 Total: 37.19
 *******Order 2*******
 1 chocolate candy: 1.11
 3 teddy bear: 23.33
 Sales Tax: 3.24
 Total: 22.45
 Sum of orders: 59.64
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
